aom.scripting.xs.ai

Class ArtificialIntelligence

  • Object
    • ArtificialIntelligence

  • public abstract class ArtificialIntelligence
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of AI commands that don't fit in any of the subcategories.
    Author:
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
    Auto Syncs
    All AI commands are executed locally on the computer of the host and the results (move, build, train, research, ...) are sent to the participating players.
    See Also:
    AoM AI Reference, AoT AI Reference

      • cUnitStanceAggressive

        public final int cUnitStanceAggressive
        The aggressive unit stance. In this stance units attack any enemy unit that comes into sight.
        See Also:
        aiSetDefaultStance(int), Constant Field Values

      • cUnitStanceDefensive

        public final int cUnitStanceDefensive
        The defensive unit stance. In this stance units will not leave the area they are defending, even if under attack.
        See Also:
        aiSetDefaultStance(int), Military.aiSetAttackResponseDistance(float), Constant Field Values

      • cUnitStancePassive

        public final int cUnitStancePassive
        The passive stance. In this stance a unit will not leave his spot, even if under attack. In this stance Economic units will continue doing their task even if under attack.
        See Also:
        aiSetDefaultStance(int), UnitType.Economic, Constant Field Values
